content: Great article, amazing website! As a side note: for windows users you may want to consider setting the body overflow to visible on gyroscpo.pe as the animation starts before the browser (chrome 54) realize it needs one and a reflow kicks in, you can check hard-reloading the page. This may actually make for another suggestion in the article: osx guys test on windows from time to time where all those stuff like bootstrap modals brake the page flow.
